definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Practice reading skills such as skimming and scanning for information.
sentences.chinese: 不斷練習閱讀技巧如略讀和掃讀以確定具體信息。

sentences.english: Only skim or scan for numbers and names. Otherwise, read at normal speed.
sentences.chinese: 略讀或掃讀文章和名字，其餘部分都用正常速度閱讀。

sentences.english: And finding the content amidst the tags makes skimming difficult.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在標記當中查找內容使得略讀也很困難。

sentences.english: Practise reading skills such as skimming and scanning for information.
sentences.chinese: 不斷練習閱讀技巧如略讀和掃讀以確定具體信息。

sentences.english: Scanning these abstracts is a handy way to quickly examine a large collection of papers for their key points.
sentences.chinese: 略讀摘要是迅速獲取大量文獻關鍵信息的神技。
